name: Wavy Brawl
description:
Wavy Brawl is our own take at the good old classic 2D arcade fighting games like Street Fighter and Mortal Kombat. 

Wave your enemies to death, fight them with cool vibes or bring a microwave as a weapon into the battle. 

Destroy your opponent and become the Ultimate Wave Lord of Infinity!

Technology Notes: 
-Animated with Adobe Edge Animate. 

-Vissual Arts made with Adobe tools and other minor tools. 

-Sound effects and music made with FL Studio 12, Audacity and other minor tools.

-Made with Unity, passion and love.
